Actions: Until the Raid Monster's next turn, each opponent's first spell costs (1) more to cast.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Return target nonland permanent with CMC 2 or less to its owner's hand.[Instant][CMC:2]
Tap target nonland permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.[Instant][CMC:2]
Draw a card. Each opponent puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:1]
Each opponent reveals their hand. Choose one instant or sorcery; they exile it.[Sorcery][CMC:2]
Counter target spell unless its controller pays (2).[Instant][CMC:2]
The Raid Monster creates a 1/1 blue Illusion token with flying. It has 'When this dies, draw a card.'[Creature][CMC:2]
Until the Raid Monster's next turn, creatures entering the battlefield do so tapped.[Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each opponent shuffles their graveyard into their library, then mills 2 cards.[Sorcery][CMC:2]
